title: 322C.1008 ACTION ON PLAN OF CONVERSION BY CONVERTING LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY.
text:
Subject to section 322C.1015, a plan of conversion must be consented to by all the members of a converting limited liability company.
Subject to section 322C.1015 and any contractual rights, after a conversion is approved, and at any time before articles of conversion are delivered to the secretary of state for filing under section 322C.1009, a converting limited liability company may amend the plan or abandon the conversion:
(1) as provided in the plan; or
(2) except as otherwise prohibited in the plan, by the same consent as was required to approve the plan.
